text: Grammitis basalis is a species of fern in the family Polypodiaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== basalis Category:Ferns of Ecuador Category:Endemic flora of Ecuador Category:Ferns of the Americas Category:Endangered flora of South America Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Grammitis basalis
